RBE 2002

Sophomore Year College

The second course in the four course sequence. RBE 2002 primarly focuses on teaching how to deal with different kinds of sensors like the ultrasonic distance sensor, push-button touch sensor, infrared distance sensor, and the infared heat sensor.

Integrate and wiring all the sensors is quite a challenge and I learned to integrate all the sensors using the necessary arduino libraries to create the necessary classes and objects. Making the approriate functions to gather the data necessary for sensing in the final challenge of the project.

The final challenge is to make a robot that is capable of navigating itself in a maze to find a fire and blow it out using a fan or other fire-extinguishing mechanism and report the location of a fire using an LCD or displaying the buffer on a Website.

The Challenge taught me a lot about CAD, Wire Management, C/C++, I2C/SPI Busses adn many more !
